Text: Thanks Jierdan, there's not much sci-fi wallpaper on TPB, so the nearly 800 MB "Techno Magic & Science" collection is welcome indeed!

In this torrent is not so much "wallpapers" because they were not my goal.

Sorry for the russian some filenames. Rename them if they disturbing.

I put torrent in haste at the request of roleplayers. So, corrections and additions will follow later.

BTW, in "Cities, Landscapes & Worlds" is cityscape, futuristic and estraterrestial environment. 

How to add "Description" to this page?

"Wallpapers" may not have been your goal, but using ACDSee Pro, I can use any image as "desktop wallpaper", it scales an image up, or down, as needed, to fit the screen, while keeping the original aspect ratio.

And there are a lot of images here that are new to me, so thanks again for this great collection!
Fantastic collection of images. There is well over 25,000 images here. Excellent quality and really useful. Many thanks.
